articles.title: Six dead in apparent gang violence at Guatemala football match - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: At least six people were killed and four injured during clashes between armed alleged gang members at an indoor football match in Guatemala, police said, in the latest mass violence at sporting events in Latin America. The bloodshed, which occurred Saturday n…
